    Hardware report (experimental)

    Source: R/dr_down.R
    dr_down.Rd

    dr_down analyzes the R markdown capabilities of the hardware.

    Usage

    dr_down()

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  indiedown::dr_down()
} # }
